result.execSummary:
All charges against Gerald W Hill Jr in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Gerald W Hill Jr is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $828.50 entered as ordered by the court on 12/18/15 to pay $60.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 01/03/17. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court.  Peter A. Hahn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Property return hearing conducted.  Court finds no reason for the property to be withheld from the petitioner.  Court ordered the property on police inventory number 15000182 returned.  Order for Return of Property signed and filed and copy given to petitioner.
Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs, signed and filed.  Copy mailed to defendant.
Attorney Fee Trust - Escrow payment plan created 11/18/15 to repay Milwaukee County $60.00 monthly for attorney fees. First payment commencing 11/4/15.
Return of property hearing at 12-21-2015 08:15 am
MPD Inventory #15000182(GERALD HILL).

ADDRESS INFO for Gerald W Hill Jr
Current: 5134 N 40th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209 United States  (Effective: 11-09-2015)
Prior: 3329 North 14th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court with Attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State informs Court they are unable to proceed to trial on today's date as the victim has not appeared in court.
Defense counsel motion to dismiss.
Court orders case dismissed without prejudice.   Jury trial is vacated.
Clerk:  jms

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Motion of the State to Adjourn Jury Trial is heard and granted by the Court, based on the unavailability of the essential witness.  Defense is opposed to adjournment.  Court ordered Jury Trial adjourned to Branch 38 on 11-4-2015 at 8:15 am.  Parties are advised that EFFECTIVE August 3, 2015, this case will be assigned to JUDGE WAGNER, BRANCH 38, in Room 504 in the Courthouse.   mld
to Adjourn from the State, received and filed.   mld

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Off the record.  Case adjourned for Jury Trial in Branch 4 on 7-22-2015 at 8:30 am.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date, signed and filed.   mld

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Evan Glaberson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Pretrial Conference held off the record.  Parties will be exploring a possible deferred prosecution agreement.  Case adjourned for Plea Hearing in Branch 4 on 3-31-2015 at 8:30 am.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date, signed and filed.   mld
signed and filed.   mld

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant appears pro-se. 
Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.   Case passed.

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case recalled,  Upon questioning, Court appoints Attorney Christopher Erl, who was present and agreed to accepting the case.  Court orders Attorney Christopher Ertl to be paid at the rate of $60.00 per hour.  Defendant will repay the County at the rate of $60.00 per month commencing upon the conclusion of case.  Discovery received by defense counsel.  Case adjourned for Pretrial Conference in Branch 4 on 2-11-2015 at 8:30 am.  All conditions of bail are continued until further order order of the Court.   mld

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
01-03-15
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Lamisha C.
The Court ordered no possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Gerald W Hill in court.  Jeffrey James Altenburg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not want Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 04.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 1/5/15 @ 1:30 pm
